data.title: Secure solution
data.description: Built with security as the primary requirement. Supports 2FA. Set minimum passphrase requirement, password expiry and session time out frequency.

data.title: Free and open source
data.description: Oneauth is free for both personal and commercial purposes. You get access to all advanced capabilities that you would expect from an identity provider.

data.title: Easy configuration
data.description: Create, configure and connect your space with apps from one place. With a REST API endpoint, integration procedure is universal across any platform and framework.
